text: The UAE Tour () is a road cycling stage race in the United Arab Emirates. It was first held in 2019 as part of the UCI World Tour. It was created as a result of the merging of the Abu Dhabi Tour and the Dubai Tour. ==History== The first edition of the UAE Tour took place between 24 February and 2 March 2019 as part of the 2019 UCI World Tour. ==Winners== ==See also== * Dubai Tour * Abu Dhabi Tour ==References== == External links== * Official website Category:UCI World Tour races Category:Cycle races in the United Arab Emirates Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in the United Arab Emirates
title: UAE Tour
